short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make reading news online more fun. Based on the XKCD comic http://xkcd.com/1288/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is pretty straightforward: once installed, you need only click the extension button and the substitutions will be applied to all text on the page. Read about Elf-Lords rallying behind Obama, or wealthy people crashing their atomic cats.
